name: Arbitrum
description: Built to scale Ethereum, Arbitrum brings you 10x lower costs while inheriting Ethereum’s security model. Arbitrum is a Layer 2 Optimistic Rollup.

name: Base Bridge
description: Base Bridge enables the transfer of certain digital assets and other data back and forth between Ethereum and Base.

name: Polygon Bridge & Staking
description: Ethereum sidechain

name: Optimism Bridge
description: Bridge between Optimism and Ethereum

name: Avalanche Core Bridge
description: Native Bitcoin Bridge. ETH EVM support. No added fees or middlemen, ever.

name: Zircuit Staking
description: The Zircuit staking is designed to reward participating users and communities that help bootstrap native, day-one liquidity to Zircuit. Zircuit is a modular zk rollup with AI-enabled security at the sequencer level

name: B2 Buzz
description: Launched by B² Network, B² Buzz is a staking event where a user can deposit major cryptocurrency assets from Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB Chain, and Polygon. By doing so, a user will receive a certain amount of Parts which can be used to assemble Mining Rigs. Mining Rigs are employed to mine B² native tokens.

name: Mantle Bridge
description: Mantle Network is a Layer-2 (L2) scalability solution built on Ethereum which is the Layer-1 (L1).

name: Noble
description: Native stablecoin and RWA issuance for the Cosmos ecosystem

name: World Chain
description: World Chain is a permissionless Layer 2 blockchain on Ethereum, built with the OP Stack, offering scalability, security, Sybil resistance, community governance, and is part of the OP Superchain ecosystem

name: Sonic Gateway
description: Canonical Bridge for Sonic chain

name: Starknet Bridge
description: Transfer assets between StarkNet and Ethereum

name: Unichain Bridge
description: The L2 designed for DeFi. By Uniswap. Built on the Superchain.

name: Sophon Bridge
description: Sophon is a ZK chain

name: SuiBridge
description: Sui Bridge is a cutting-edge native bridge on Sui, designed to enhance interoperability between Sui and Ethereum. It enables users to securely and efficiently transfer native and wrapped ETH to and from Sui. The bridge leverages the unique capabilities of the Sui network to offer fast transaction speeds, lower transaction costs, and a decentralized architecture.

name: AO Bridge
description: A decentralized supercomputer built on top of Arweave's permanent data storage.

name: xDAI Stake Bridge
description: The first-ever USD stable blockchain and multi-chain staking token.

name: RSK Bridge
description: RSK bridge with Ethereum. You can convert your tokens from RSK to Ethereum and viceversa.

name: Karak
description: The universal restaking layer powered by the entire cryptoeconomy.

name: Frax Ether
description: Frax Ether is a liquid ETH staking derivative designed to uniquely leverage the Frax Finance ecosystem to maximize staking yield and smoothen the Ethereum staking process for a simplified, secure, and DeFi-native way to earn interest on ETH.

name: Linea Bridge
description: The main bridge, on a technical level, in Linea is the Canonical Message Bridge. This is the underlying set of smart contracts which keep track of receiving requests to move tokens to the other layer, and of sending the message that those tokens should be transferred.

name: Blast Bridge
description: Bridge between Ethereum and Blast Mainnet.

name: zkSync Era txBridge
description: Imagine a platform where zksync enthusiasts and developers all come together to learn, create, and innovate

name: Metis Bridge
description: Bridge between Metis and Ethereum

name: Lisk Bridge
description: We offer Web3 founders in Emerging Markets the ultimate ecosystem to bring their real-world applications to life.

name: Manta CeDeFi
description: Manta CeDeFi: offering more opportunities for Manta users through a diversified approach to earning yield through CeFi and DeFi.

name: Scroll Bridge
description: Transfer assets between Scroll and Ethereum

name: Swell Liquid Staking
description: Swell is a non-custodial liquid staking protocol

name: Chiliz Governance Staking
description: CHZ locked for the governance of Chiliz Chain, Validators and delegators stake their CHZ to take part in the governance of the PoSA chain in order to create and validate new blocks as well as to vote on any changes which require governance consensus.

name: SX Rollup Bridge
description: Bridge between Ethereum and SX Network

name: Pulsechain
description: Energy efficient, Faster, cheaper, fee-burning Ethereum fork.

name: Abstract
description: Abstract is a Layer 2 on Ethereum using zero-knowledge (ZK) rollups to scale by batching off-chain transactions and verifying them on-chain with ZK proofs, while remaining EVM-compatible for easy smart contract deployment

name: Immutable zkEVM
description: Immutable zkEVM is a chain for games that offers EVM compatibility, low cost, massive scale, and Ethereum security. Cutting-edge technology in gaming with a largest ecosystem in web3

name: Astar dApps Staking
description: Astar Network is a multi-chain decentralized application layer on Kusama Network. dApp staking is a mechanism that incentives developers who built in the Astar ecosystem. Users can stake on those dApps to earn staking rewards and at the same time support the project by giving them a daily income.

name: Gravity by Galxe
description: Gravity, built by Galxe, is an omnichannel settlement layer designed for mass adoption. It uses Zero-Knowledge Proofs, staking architecture, and advanced consensus mechanisms for high performance.

name: Eclipse Bridge
description: Solana on Ethereum - Ethereum's first SVM L2

name: zkSync Lite Bridge
description: Bridge between zkSync Lite and Ethereum chain

name: Taiko Bridge
description: A Based Contestable Rollup, Ethereum-equivalent ZK-EVM

name: zkLink Nova
description: The first aggregated Layer 3 zkEVM network that links Ethereum and its Layer 2 Rollups for any use case, with exceptional composability, interoperability, scalability, and security through zero-knowledge proofs.

name: Cronos zkEVM Bridge
description: The next generation zero-knowledge layer 2 chain

name: Soneium Bridge
description: Bridge between Ethereum and Soneium

name: RSS3 Bridge
description: Bridge to/from the VSL chain

name: Ink Bridge
description: Bridge for Ink chain by Kraken

name: Sorare Bridge
description: Bridge between Ethereum and Sorare

name: Mode Bridge
description: Bridge between Ethereum and Mode Network.

name: Core Earn
description: Liquid Staking on the Core Network. Users deposited CORE and get stCORE

name: Zora Bridge
description: Ethereum L2: post for fun. earn for real
